bannerTitle: Tax Free Shopping on your mobile
firstSectionTitle: We're making tax free shopping better for non-EU residents visiting the UK!
firstSectionFirstPointBody: In-store tax refund companies charge you up to 50% in commissions, fees, and exchange rates. We charge you much less, so you get more tax back!
firstSectionSecondPointBody: Use our refund app for any physical shop in the UK. Enjoy the same service whether you are in a luxury department store or a small souvenir shop!
firstSectionThirdPointTitle: WE DO THE BORING PAPERWORK FOR YOU
firstSectionThirdPointBody: Forget manually filling in multiple forms from different stores. We put all your receipts together into one tax free form.
secondSectionFirstPointBody: Take pictures of all your shop receipts. We will process them for you into a single tax free form.
secondSectionSecondPointBody: Finished shopping and ready to fly home? Print your tax free form before going to the airport!
secondSectionThirdPointBody: Follow the instructions within the app on how to get your form authorised by Customs at the airport.
secondSectionFourthPointBody: Select your preferred payment method and we'll send you the money!
